summary: A deformed hunchback gets a second chance in life, but it is abruptly taken away when he accidentally kills a man.
cast: P. Ramlee|Sri Dewi|Ahmad C.|Rosiah Chik|Shariff Dol|Ali Fiji|Ahmad Ghani|Raja Hamidah|Rokiah Hashim|Daeng Idris|Nyong Ismail|Salleh Kamil|Haji Mahadi|Malik Sutan Muda|Mustarjo|Fatimah Osman|Prani Pramat|M. Rafee|A. Rahim|Ali Rahman|Rahmah Rahmat|Salbiah|Omar Suwita|Marion Willis
title: Sumpah orang minyak
